_comment: Resource keys follow pattern: SERVICE_RESOURCE_TYPE (e.g., GITHUB_PAT, SERPER_API_KEY, QDRANT_HOST)
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: API key for Anthropic's Claude AI models
OPENAI_API_KEY: API key for OpenAI GPT models
SERPER_API_KEY: API key for Serper Google search service
GITHUB_PAT: GitHub Personal Access Token for API operations
RAILWAY_API_TOKEN: Railway platform API token for deployments
DEEPSEEK_API_KEY: API key for DeepSeek AI models
OPENROUTER_API_KEY: API key for OpenRouter AI gateway
GOOGLE_API_KEY: Google API key for various Google services
BROWSERLESS_API_KEY: API key for Browserless browser automation service
FIRECRAWL_API_KEY: API key for Firecrawl web scraping service
